message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a one-time price of $12,000. It's a steal considering its value to you is $15,000!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $10,000?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500? It's a fair price considering the product's value to you is $15,000.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we settle at $10,750?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11,250, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal for you considering the product's value to you is $15,000.
Alice, I'm trying to be mindful of my budget. Could you do $11,000 even?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $11,250, Bob. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. If you're willing to meet me at $11,250, I'll include a free accessory that's worth $500. It's a great opportunity to get an amazing deal on a top-notch product!
